bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
0 parameter of Embedding layer, when print_summary() <denchmark-h:h2>Environment info (Required)</denchmark-h>

model.initialize(mx.init.Xavier(),ctx=ctx) model.hybridize()
